channel.title: Litecoin installation Whonix
channel.description:
I know this is not only for whonix, but can anybody tell me how to install litecoin wallet? I google about this, but I need it step by step, because im new in debian and linux.
A good link is also fine. Thanks

item.title: Litecoin installation Whonix
item.dc:creator: Occq
item.description:
Package litecoin (litecoin-qt) is in the unstable distro of Debian

Search for “how to get packages from unstable to Wheezy”.

http://jaqque.sbih.org/kplug/apt-pinning.html

Read full topic
